web_snippets: Geoff Dyer is a profoundly intelligent memoirist. His childhood emerges from these pages as both his utterly distinctive experience and the shared history ...
Geoff Dyer is the author of four novels and many non-fiction books on a wide variety of subjects including jazz, the First World War, photography, DH Lawrence.
